content.raw:
Calling the rosservice `/subt/finish` does not currently stop CloudSim to my knowledge.  This may be a candidate feature for Cave Circuit to allow for quick CloudSim testing.  I believe that some of the `simple` environments may have lower total testing time thresholds but that may not help depending upon your testing goals.

Keep in mind that sometimes resources take some time to gather/tear down on AWS that may slow down your desired feedback loop.  The simulator will attempt to run at real-time but it may not be able to depending upon how many vehicles you are testing with and their corresponding sensor configurations.  If you want to quickest turn-around possible, try using a single vehicle with the simplest sensor configuration that is feasible for you.
content.html:
Calling the rosservice /subt/finish does not currently stop CloudSim to my knowledge. This may be a candidate feature for Cave Circuit to allow for quick CloudSim testing. I believe that some of the simple environments may have lower total testing time thresholds but that may not help depending upon your testing goals.

Keep in mind that sometimes resources take some time to gather/tear down on AWS that may slow down your desired feedback loop. The simulator will attempt to run at real-time but it may not be able to depending upon how many vehicles you are testing with and their corresponding sensor configurations. If you want to quickest turn-around possible, try using a single vehicle with the simplest sensor configuration that is feasible for you.
